song.title: God's own Son
song.lyrics:
[C] God's own Son Came down from heaven. He is called Emmanuel. God's own Son Came down from heaven. Alleluia!
[V1] Jesus Christ, You are our Saviour. Son of God and king eternal. As a man, You came to save us. You are God with us.
[V2] Jesus when You came among us, You were placed into a manger. Stripped of all your heav'nly glory, You are God with us.
[V3] God from God and light from true light. Truly one with God the Father, With no end, with no beginning, He is God with us.
[V4] Jesus is the light to follow. Shining forth for all the nations Jesus takes away our worries, He is God with us.
[V5] When our hearts are feeling heavy, Burdened with life's care and worries Jesus, You are there to lead us, You are God with us.
